params.blockNumber: The block number containing the transaction
params.chainId: The chain where the transaction was submitted
params.requiredConfirmations: Number of confirmations needed for finality

params.rpcUrl: The RPC endpoint URL for the chain

awaitFinality(bytes32,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Register a pending finality request for a transaction

getPendingFinality(bytes32).notice: Get pending finality details for a transaction

getSubscription(uint256).notice: Get subscription details for a chain

onBlock(uint256,uint256,bytes32).notice: Process a new block for a subscribed chain
